longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and/or passport replacing documents issued to
  nationals of Nicaragua must be valid on arrival. 

Visa required, except for A max. stay of 90 days: 
 - for holders of passports issued by Nicaragua; 
Minors:
- Children up to and including 14 years of age
  
Additional Information:
- Visitors are required to hold proof of sufficient funds to
  cover their stay and documents required for their next
  destination.
- Holders of tourist visas must also hold hotel vouchers. 
Warning:
- Visitors not holding return/onward ticket could be refused
  entry
